rules.description: Post Escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Mapping Ctrl + Cmd + q to F1 (Default Screen Lock)
Mapping Ctrl + Cmd + Space to F2 (Default Screen Lock)
Map Left Option + Spacebar to Enter
Press left_command alone produces F15 (Mouse Button 1)
Press right_shift alone produces Left Control (Mission Control)
Tab Modifier Mode [Tab as Trigger Key]
